name: Dimension Door
effect:
:effect_map: Move a [Hero](../heroes/index.md) up to \* field(s). Ignore any obstacles and fields in-between and resolve the last one normally.

:empower: 0 ➣ \*1
:empower: 2 ➣ \*2
:empower: 4 ➣ \*3

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: Dimension Door can only move the caster's Hero, not a Hero controlled by any other player.
May be used to jump over blocked fields.
